compatibility.notes: CECIIL-2.1 allows linking with other licenses under certain conditions, but care must be taken with GPL licenses due to their strong copyleft nature.

key_requirements: Users must ensure that the software is used in a secure manner.
Users are encouraged to test the software for suitability before use.
license.name: CECILL-2.1
obligations: Users must disclose the source code when redistributing modified versions.
Users must include the license text with any distribution.
Users must include copyright notices in redistributions.
Users must state changes made to the original software.
Redistributions must be under the same license.
